RINGCENTRAL_CHATBOT_DATABASE_CONNECTION_.description: Database uri. Leave this default for the 1st deployment and copy DATABASE_URL value to here right after.

RINGCENTRAL_CHATBOT_CLIENT_ID.description: Client Id for your bot, from App Settings on RingCentral Developer Portal

RINGCENTRAL_CHATBOT_CLIENT_SECRET.description: Client Secret for your bot, from App Settings on RingCentral Developer Portal

RINGCENTRAL_CHATBOT_SERVER.description: Bot server url. Leave this default for the 1st deployment and fill in right after

IM_SHARED_SECRET.description: (ignore it if your are not using Interactive Messages feature)RingCentral app interactive message shared secret
